com.wizzer.mle.runtime.util

Class MleHeapsortArray

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wizzer.mle.runtime.util.MleElementArray
      • com.wizzer.mle.runtime.util.MleHeapArray
        • com.wizzer.mle.runtime.util.MleHeapsortArray

  • public class MleHeapsortArray
extends MleHeapArray
    Sorts an array of element keys with the heapsort algorithm.

      • MleHeapsortArray

        A constructor that initializes with an empty array of length len.
        Parameters:
        len - The capacity of the array.

    • Method Detail

      • heapsort

        public void heapsort()
        Sort the input keys in increasing order. This is the entry function for the heapsort algorithm.

      • sort

        protected void sort()
        Move all elements in decreasing key size order into the result list.

        Precondition: the tree must be a heap.
